name: dilly
content:

an especially good example of a particular type of thing or person: The story I wrote was a dilly. The actor is brilliant as a scary bad guy in a dilly of a gangster thriller set in Spain.
More examplesFewer examplesShe has written a dilly of a book about this most shocking crime."I've had some dillies over the years," he said, describing people who show up for a few hours, promise to help the school and then never return.
